alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Logan; Mercer; Shelby; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 05 at 11:01AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of Central Ohio and West Central Ohio, including the following counties, in Central Ohio, Union OH. In West Central Ohio, Auglaize, Logan, Mercer and Shelby. * WHEN...Until 1245 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1101 AM EDT, radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1.5 inches are possible. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Sidney, Bellefontaine, Celina, Wapakoneta, St. Marys, Coldwater, New Bremen, Minster, St. Henry, Cridersville, West Liberty, Anna, Fort Loramie, Jackson Center, Fort Recovery, Russells Point, De Graff, Botkins, Rockford and Lakeview.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
